title.rendered: TASI Group restructures into two individual organizations: TASI Test and Automation, and TASI Measurement

content.rendered:
TASI Test and Automation to continue to expand product and service offerings in this new era of growth

As of January 1, 2024, the TASI Group is restructured into two individual organizations: TASI Test and Automation (tasigroup.com), and TASI Measurement (tasimeasurement.com).

TASI Test and Automation focuses on advanced test, inspection, and assembly solutions for the manufacturing industry that improve production processes and deliver value-added results. It is comprised of three segments: Product Integrity, Packaging Integrity, and Automation. For more information on the companies under TASI Test and Automation, please visit tasigroup.com.

TASI Measurement provides flow measurement technologies for industrial markets, including water & wastewater, irrigation, chemical processing, and oil and gas. For more information on the companies under TASI Measurement, please visit tasimeasurement.com.

Previous to this restructuring, TASI Group comprised all above business segments under one umbrella. However, following years of substantial and continuous growth, a new structural distribution of these entities presented an opportunity to more closely align companies with similar customers, products, and services for enhanced effectiveness and collaboration.

This structural change will have no impact on our customers. In fact, it will only augment and propel the industry-leading solutions and service you’ve come to expect from us.

TASI Test and Automation continues to be led by a strong, experienced leadership team. To learn more about the latest members of our leadership team, please visit tasigroup.com/leadership/.

For more information on each organization, please visit our respective websites: TASI Test and Automation (tasigroup.com), and TASI Measurement (tasimeasurement.com).
